description: Ghost Node Correction Package - Corrects conductance for non-orthogonal grid connections in MODFLOW-USG by using interpolated values from ghost nodes

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW-USG.

variables.name: NPGNCn
variables.description: Number of ghost node corrections to be specified.
variables.tooltip: Total number of ghost node correction entries. Each entry corrects the conductance of one non-orthogonal connection.

variables.name: MXGNn
variables.description: Maximum number of contributing nodes (ghost nodes) per correction. Typically 1 or 2.
variables.tooltip: Maximum number of contributing (ghost) nodes used to interpolate the corrected head at the interface. 1=single ghost node, 2=two ghost nodes for bilinear interpolation.

variables.name: NGNCNPn
variables.description: Number of GNC entries not defined by parameters.
variables.tooltip: Number of GNC correction entries specified directly (not through parameter definitions). Typically equals NPGNCn.

variables.name: IGHCOPT
variables.description: Ghost node option. 1=implicit ghost node correction, 2=explicit ghost node correction.
variables.tooltip: 1=implicit correction (correction terms in coefficient matrix, more stable). 2=explicit correction (correction in RHS, faster but potentially less stable).

variables.name: NODEJ
variables.description: Node number of the first cell in the connection being corrected (1-based).
variables.tooltip: One of the two cells sharing the non-orthogonal connection. The ghost node correction adjusts flow between NODEJ and NODEM.

variables.name: NODEM
variables.description: Node number of the second cell in the connection being corrected (1-based).
variables.tooltip: The other cell sharing the non-orthogonal connection with NODEJ.

variables.name: NODEK1
variables.description: Node number of the first contributing (ghost) node (1-based).
variables.tooltip: First ghost node used to interpolate the corrected head at the face between NODEJ and NODEM. Must be a neighbor of NODEJ.

variables.name: NODEK2
variables.description: Node number of the second contributing ghost node (1-based). Only if MXGNn >= 2.
variables.tooltip: Second ghost node for bilinear interpolation. Only read if MXGNn >= 2.

variables.name: FLALPHAn
variables.description: Contributing factor (weight) for the ghost node correction. Range: 0 to 1.
variables.tooltip: Weight factor indicating the fractional contribution of the ghost node(s) to the corrected head. If MXGNn=1, single alpha value. If MXGNn=2, two alpha values separated by space (one per ghost node). Sum should be <= 1.
